column4: How I can format an NTFS' Extern HD (USB) to an FAT32 Disk with somes partitions.. ?
format it, delete what's there now, create new aprtitions, run mkfs.
Essentially the same as 'format' on Windows.
it created an empty filesystem of the specified type.
The disks tool in the admin menu should be able to do this in a GUI fashion.
You can do it from within windows OR linux.
Can I do the format in GNOME session ?? It's a external HD... ?
do u have another prog tu use?
